M

MapredInputFormatWrapper<K,V> - Class in org.kiji.express.flow.framework
This file was adapted from: https://github.com/kevinweil/elephant-bird/blob/master/core/src/main/ java/com/twitter/elephantbird/mapred/input/DeprecatedInputFormatWrapper.java The wrapper enables an InputFormat written for new mapreduce interface to be used unmodified in contexts where a InputFormat with old mapred interface is required.
